body_html: @ezyang when you get the chance , please review. I tried to do the export WERROR=1 in a separate conditional , but it created a problem when building the ATen install. So it looks like it needs to be in line with the python setup.py install.
body_text: @ezyang when you get the chance , please review.   I tried to do the export WERROR=1  in a separate conditional , but it created a problem when building the ATen install.  So it looks like it needs to be in line with the python setup.py install.
body: @ezyang when you get the chance , please review.   I tried to do the export WERROR=1  in a separate conditional , but it created a problem when building the ATen install.  So it looks like it needs to be in line with the python setup.py install.
